title: Instant Reaction to the Deshaun Watson Trade
description:
Kevin, Nora, Ben, and Steven react to the news of Deshaun Watson being traded to the Browns, what this means for Baker Mayfield and the AFC, and how NFL teams have handled Watson over the past week.

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, Ben Solak and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Research: Daniel Comer
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
